sources.title: Fortune Is a Woman (1957) Jack Hawkins, Arlene Dahl, Christopher Lee
sources.description: Fortune Is a Woman is a 1957 black and white British-American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Sidney Gilliat and starring Jack Hawkins and Arlene Dahl, with Christopher Lee also appearing. In the United States, it was released as She Played With Fire . The film is based on Winston Graham's novel Fortune Is a Woman (1953). Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Actors: Fay Compton, Nora Swinburne, David Peel, Margaret Barton
